C E I M P S V 

V

validate() - Method in class com.johnpetitto.validator.ValidatingTextInputLayout
Invoke this when you want to validate the contained EditText text against the provided Validator.
validate(ValidatingTextInputLayout...) - Static method in class com.johnpetitto.validator.Validators
Validates multiple inputs at once and returns true if all inputs are valid.
ValidatingTextInputLayout - Class in com.johnpetitto.validator
An extension of TextInputLayout that validates the text of its child EditText and displays an error when the input is invalid.
ValidatingTextInputLayout(Context) - Constructor for class com.johnpetitto.validator.ValidatingTextInputLayout
 
ValidatingTextInputLayout(Context, AttributeSet) - Constructor for class com.johnpetitto.validator.ValidatingTextInputLayout
 
ValidatingTextInputLayout(Context, AttributeSet, int) - Constructor for class com.johnpetitto.validator.ValidatingTextInputLayout
 
Validator - Interface in com.johnpetitto.validator
Validates input for ValidatingTextInputLayout to meet some requirement.
Validators - Class in com.johnpetitto.validator
Collection of utilities for working with ValidatingTextInputLayout.
